item_category: HAMMER 5 Smart is a unique 4G smart feature phone with KaiOS. This means it has popular applications such as Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp and Google Maps pre-installed, combined with the simple functionality of a classic feature phone. The rugged device has IP68 certification, making it dust and water resistant, along with an exceptionally large 2500 mAh battery and 2.4 display.
review_title: I don't like touch screen phones
By no means a rugged phone
My mobile phone looks great n well made
review_text:
Order came from a 3rd party, which I was quite surprised about, and the the plug for the phone was broken. The only thing holding it together were the wires inside.
" VERY DISAPPOINTED "
The actual phone itself is not bad, dual sim, WhatsApp, Email, QR Scanner ( which doesn't work), but it's OK for what I needed. Not actually very heavy, but it is a big phone, looked a lot smaller in the pictures.

It's really good. Does what I needed it for, dual sim - for work and home. Check WhatsApp, ring and text. You can use the internet but it's a bit strange. I couldn't use the pre installed whats app at first but that was because it was still on my old phone, I had to uninstall it from there and the pre-installed one and then download it from the store. Also texting is obviously slower with buttons and the battery is not as long as you'd think but at least 2 days before another charge.
The language kept changing to polish

This phone gives the appearance of being rugged but in a nutshell it's pretty naff & we'd have been better investing in a new smart phone with a gorilla case.  There is no facility to lock the screen & prevent dialling of 999, it has limited ring tones & to be honest if it was dropped I'm not quite convinced the built-in casing would prevent breakage.  The screen is small & not touch operated.  The style is good but (put simply) this could have been a much better phone if designed better.
very hardy phone,good battery life has a retro look.i can reccomend it.
Good smart phone with features..rugged case..

I was looking for something different from usual smartphones that I seem to break, which cost me money, on a monthly basis! Great device that allows me to use all the standard apps and isn't afraid of water or being dropped!
